system.requirement: If you wield nunchaku or tonfa...

abilities.description: In your hands, these wooden weapons are deadly (2 harm). When you instead use it as a simple weapon (1 harm), you may @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.ironswornmoves.Item.5288e935906f6d28]{Strike} or @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.ironswornmoves.Item.7e008d0f656dc8b3]{Clash} edge (instead of +iron). If you do, add +1 and take +1 momentum on a hit.

When you @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.ironswornmoves.Item.4dd8468e095810a4]{Secure an Advantage} +edge using your nunchaku to disarm, intimidate, or force back your opponent, add +1 and take +1 momentum on a hit.
When you @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.ironswornmoves.Item.c8bacc17f73d3103]{Face Danger} +edge to precisely block or deflect an incoming attack, add +1 and take +1 momentum on a hit.
